Continue Reading
item.content:encoded:
Price: $15.99
(as of Jun 11,2021 08:47:33 UTC – Details)



Sometimes the only thing between you and death is a frying pan. Protect yourself with this life-size Frying Pan replica, complete with the PUBG logo embossed on the inside of the pan. Ideal for costumes, cosplay, conventions, parties and more. Please note that this is just a toy; we do not recommend using it to cook food nor use it to deflect bullets! Durable and safe high density foam construction. Measures approximately 14 inches long, 8.58 inches across and 1.5 inches deep. Ages 15 and up. Officially licensed by PUBG; designed and created by JINX.

LAND, LOOT, SURVIVE: 3D molded PUBG frying pan with PUBG logo on inside of pan
GREAT FOR ROLE-PLAY: Ideal for Halloween costumes and cosplay, conventions, parties
1:1 SCALE PROP REPLICA: Measures approximately 14 inches long, 8.58 inches across and 1.5 inches deep
SAFETY FIRST: Suitable for ages 15 and up; this is a toy so please don’t use to cook food or use to deflect real bullets
AUTHENTIC PUBG MERCH: Officially licensed by PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds; designed and created by JINX

Continue Reading
item.content:encoded:
Price: $15.99 - $11.99
(as of Jun 11,2021 08:47:33 UTC – Details)


Product Description

No Slip Rubber Pad to Make Phone Secure Locked in Place

Phone body and controller are firmly fixed through three contact points covered of rubber pads to prevent the phone sliding, and won’t press your on off button and volume keys, or scratch your phone.

Rotatable Conductive Touch Pad

180Â° flipped for easy installation of the phone and customize buttons layout without removing the phone. No occlusion of your view, wouldn’t block the map, responsive and no delay.

Ergonomic Phone Controller

DELAM gamepad is specially designed for mobile shooting games, it extends your phone to a traditional Xbox or PS controller, more comfortable for big hands and keep you away from hand cramps.

Playing While Charging

The side of the phone will not be blocked, so you can charge it freely when playing.

Hate that charging cable getting in the way when playing fierce survival games? We solved it for you. The trigger button are set on the back not shoulder, so there is an angle and distance between your index finger and the cable, it won’t interfere with your operation at all.

Phone Secure Locked in Place

Rotatable Conductive Touch Head

Ergonomic Phone Controller

Playing While Charging

6 Fingers Operation to Enhance Your Game Skills

Just use your index and middle fingers to press the L1 R1 L2 R2 triggers, that shooting, aiming, left/ right tilted head, moving, jumping, squatting and and lying operations can be performed at the same time, It will be a breeze to defeat the thumb-hold players.

Responsive Alloy L1R1 L2R2 Triggers

98K trigger design, simulated real firing.

Responsive and no delay, customize buttons layout, easily killing and surviving better in mobile battle royale games.

Gamepad for Hardcore Players of Mobile Battle Royale Games

Works for PUBG Mobile/ Critical Ops/ Rules of Survival/ Knives Out/ Cross Fire/ Terminator 2 Judgment Day/ Survivor Royale ect, as long as the game allows customize and drag the keys.

Support All 4.7-6.5″ Smart Phones of Android & iOS Device

Telescopic-boom grip can be stretched to 70-90mm.

Support phones such as iPhoneXS/XS MAX/XR/X/8/7/7plus/6s/6splus/6/6plus/5s/5c/5, SamsungS9/S8/S8+/Note9/Note8, Nexus5X/6P, LGG5G6V20, Lumia950, Lumia950XL, HuaweiP10/P9/P9Plus, OnePlus2/3, NokiaN1, HTC10ï¼GALAXY etc, as long as the phone which length is within 6.5 inches

6 FINGERS OPERATION, FULL OF CHICKEN DINNER- Just use your index and middle fingers to press the L1 R1 L2 R2 triggers, that shooting, aiming, left/ right tilted head, moving, jumping, squatting and and lying operations can be performed at the same time, It will be a breeze to defeat the thumb-hold players, also a massive advantage in close range combat because difference in milliseconds can be life or death. No disconnection, response delay, root request or system incompatibility issues.
180Â°FLIP DESIGNED CONDUCTIVE TOUCH HEAD- Rotatable touch head for easy installation of the phone and customize buttons layout without removing the phone. High-density conductive rubber and alloy triggers ensure speedy and sensitive response, and it won’t obscure the game map. Alloy l1 r1 l2 r2 buttons are tested over 100,000 times to ensure durability and fast responsive.
TELESCOPIC-BOOM GRIP & PLAYING WHILE CHARGING- The stretchable grip makes it compatible with all 4.7-6.5â phones of iOS and Android device. The side of the phone will not be blocked, so you can charge it freely when playing. Hate that charging cable getting in the way when playing fierce survival games? We solved it for you. The triggers are set on the back not shoulder, so there is an angle and distance between your index finger and the cable, it won’t interfere with your operation at all.
ERGONOMIC CONTROLLER & PHONE SECURE LOCKED IN PLACE- People may get hands cramps after playing hours of battle royal games with cellphone. DELAM gamepad is specially designed for mobile shooting games, it extends your phone to a traditional Xbox or PS controller, more comfortable for big hands. Phone body and controller are firmly fixed through three contact points covered of rubber pads to prevent the phone sliding, and won’t press your on off button and volume keys, or scratch your phone.
A MUST GAMEPAD FOR HARDCORE PLAYERS OF BATTLE ROYALE GAMES- Work for PUBG Mobile/ Call Of Duty Mobile/ Free Fire/ Critical Ops/ Rules of Survival/ Knives Out/ Cross Fire/ Terminator 2 Judgment Day/ Survivor Royale as long as the game allows customize and drag the keys. Please feel free to contact us at the first time if you have any questions or problems.
